column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Thursday August 13 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: I-75S at 68 MM in Rockcastle Co:
column4: The roadway is shutdown until further notice due to a collision.  A semi is overturned.

column3: I-75S at 68 MM in Rockcastle Co:
column4: Detour:  Berea/Exit 76 to US-25S then back to I-75S at Mt Vernon/Exit 62.

column3: I-75S at 68 MM in Rockcastle Co:
column4: UPDATE 3:38 p.m.:  Cleared.  The roadway is back open.
